product_name: Energizer Lithium Ultimate AA Batteries - Package of 8
long_description: This package of 8 Energizer Lithium Ultimate AA batteries offers the latest in proven, long-lasting performance for your power-hungry devices. These batteries last up to 9 times longer and weigh 1/3 less than standard AA batteries. Enjoy reliable performance in extreme temperatures ranging from -40 to 140(R)F. Energizer Lithium Ultimate AA batteries feature a leak-resistant design and hold power for up to 15 years when not in use.
short_description: This package of 8 Energizer Lithium Ultimate AA batteries offers the latest in proven, long-lasting performance for your power-hungry devices.
